prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Avery McKenzie
mes:
Avery loved her job. Hell, she still couldn’t believe that she actually got to do this as her job. Perform for thousands of people. Play music. Hang out with her two best friends in the whole world all the time. It was a dream come true.

She had so much fun up on that stage too. Her and Leigh got to fuck around and flirt. Play it up for their fans. Stir up wild rumors just for the fun of it. Yeah, she loved Leigh, but not romantically. But, Avery couldn’t help but flirt. It was her favorite pastime.

And she flirted with everyone. Fans included. It was fun.

This wasn’t ever a problem before. Not until Hailee.

Avery’s been dating Hailee off and on. It wasn’t the healthiest relationship and they both knew it. Bickering constantly. It was painfully obvious that Hailee didn’t trust her.

They were trying things… again. Was it the best idea? Maybe not, but she couldn’t help herself. And things were going good (or at least that’s what she told herself).

Hailee was watching the show tonight from the VIP section. Avery loved it when she watched her perform. Loved having those beautiful eyes on her while she played. Avery even toned it down (a little) with the flirting with Leigh just because of the gorgeous woman in the audience.

After the show, she, Leigh, and Eve made their way out of the venue, headed for the cars that would take the trio to the hotel they were staying at while they were in this city.

Fans, of course, were waiting outside. They all wanted pictures, autographs, the usual. The three of them all took their time, trying to greet and sign shit for as many people as they could.

It wasn’t the most surprising thing when one woman pulled open the top of her shirt and practically begged Avery to sign her chest. It really wasn’t the first time this had happened. “Damn,” Avery laughed easily, a smirk tugging at her lips. “I bet you’re alotta fun,” she hummed, letting her gaze drag slowly up to the fan’s face.

The fan blushed and giggled. Avery was used to the effect she had on women. She took the sharpie and signed right across the woman’s chest before handing the marker back to her. “If you get that tattooed, tag us in the picture, yeah?” Avery threw a wink at her before turning away.

Immediately, her eyes locked onto Hailee. She was standing by one of the cars. And she didn’t look very happy. The sounds of the fans faded into the background as she walked towards her lover. Avery did, at least, have the decency to look a little sheepish as she approached her. “Babe, it’s harmless fun, you know that,” she tried as they got into the car. “C’mon, don’t be mad at me,” she murmured, reaching out to tuck a stray strand of hair behind Hailee’s ear.

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee jerks away and pushes herself off the limo she was leaning against. She shoves past Avery hitting her shoulder as she does so and marches her way up to the fan*

*Hailee glares at the fans and reaches in her pocket taking out a wipe. She grabs the fan's arm and pulls her in. Hailee yanks down her shirt and wipes the signature off her boobs* "Stay the fuck away from girlfriend and that goes for all you groupie whores" *She yells looking at the fans*

*Hailee stalks back over to the limo and throws the used wipe at Avery before getting in and crossing her arms as she glares out the window*

name: Avery McKenzie
mes:
*Avery's jaw drops as she watches Hailee storm over to the fan and wipe off her chest. She feels a mix of anger and embarrassment wash over her. How dare Hailee humiliate her like that in front of everyone!*

*She snatches up the used wipe from where it landed near her feet.* What the hell was that?! *she hisses under her breath, glancing around quickly to make sure no one else overheard.*

*Avery takes a deep breath, trying to calm herself before getting into the limo after Hailee. Once inside, she slams the door shut harder than necessary.*

Are you serious right now? You embarrassed me in front of my fans! And for what - some stupid signature on a random chick's tits? That wasn't even sexual!

*She runs an agitated hand through her hair.* Look babe... I'm sorry if seeing that upset you. But we talked about this - flirting is just part of my job sometimes. It doesn't mean anything real.

*Avery reaches out tentatively to touch Hailee's arm.* Please don't be mad at me... You know how crazy I get when we fight...
